assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Bardella S.A. Indústrias Mecânicas manufactures and supplies equipment for the metallurgy, energy, oil and gas, cargo handling, service, mining and port, and metal sectors. It offers hydromechanical equipment, including dams and river locks for the energy sector; and metallic structures, filters, reactors, risers, storage tanks, process towers, heat exchangers, pipes, and pressure vessel, as well as christmas trees, cranes, and skids for platforms for oil and gas sector. The company also provides bridges, gantry cranes, and semi-gantry cranes for hydro and thermoelectric plants, aluminum, paper and cellulose steel mills, refineries, automotive industry, and machinery industry, as well as cellulose bales and paper reels, of scrap bins, of rolling mill rolls, of containers; steel and non-ferrous metals for metal industry; and ore forklifts and recoverers, portal-type ore reclaimers, simple and compound wagon dumpers, and belt conveyors for mining industry. In addition, it offers bridges and cranes with telescopic spreader and anti-sway system for handling port containers; ship loaders and unloaders for bulk materials and steel plates; and transtainers and portainers for moving cargo through the port yard. The company was founded in 1911 and is based in Guarulhos, Brazil.
